def sign(a):
    if(a<0):
        return -1
    elif(a==0):
        return 0
    else:
        return 1
def sign_check(a,n):
    if(n>=2):
        flag=sign(a[0]-a[1])
    else:
        return True
    i=2
    while i<n:
        if(flag==0):
            flag=sign(a[i-1]-a[i])
        else:
          z=sign(a[i-1]-a[i])
          if(z!=0):
           if(z!=flag):  
             return False
        i+=1
    return True
T=input()
while T:
    T-=1
    R=[int(x) for x in list(raw_input().strip())] 
    if(sign_check(R,len(R))):
        print "valid"
    else:
        print "invalid"
